original_text: God will fight against you. Your enemies will win the war. They will become your rulers. Your soldiers will run away even when nobody is running after them.
korean_text: 내가 너희를 치리니 너희가 너희의 대적에게 패할 것이요 너희를 미워하는 자가 너희를 다스릴 것이며 너희는 쫓는 자가 없어도 도망하리라

sentences.original_text: Your enemies will win the war.
even when nobody is running after them.
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그들을 뒤쫓지 않고 있을 때에도.
